name: Countingmon One
description:
The new version of color number puzzle game is here!
It's easy to play for everyone, but it's really hard to reach higher number.
Just download for free to enjoy this beautiful and addictive counting math game!

Practice your brain by tapping the monster, matching the same numbers. From 1, 2, 3, 4 to 18, 20, 48. How big can you get?

HOW TO PLAY :
· Tap the lovely little monster block to increase the number, but 1 live loses.
· More than 3 same numbers merge automatically, and get 1 new live.
· Game over when you lose all 5 lives.

Features:
· Endless challenge
· Easy to play, hard to master
· Magic power ups to remove 1 monster, save 1 live and undo
· Get highest score on Game Center
· Share your color numbers with friends

Please let us know if you have any idea to make this game better :)
